name: Fear Is In The Mind
description:
Is it really in the mind? This is the question asked as you navigate through a dark and almost confusing, narrative journey. With secrets to uncover and sound design that will put you on edge (or confuse you), this an experience that you'll want to give a go.

The experience contains events that capture the ten most common phobia's in the world. Do you think you can make it through?

Whatever you decide, just remember that Fear Is In the Mind.
If you enjoy the experience then please feel free to donate to my work as every little piece of support counts. Even just leaving a comment below about how much you enjoyed (or did not enjoy) the experience, is just as good as donating! Thank you for your support.
